name: Associazione Intermediari Mercati Finanziari - ASSOSIM
goal:
Associazione Intermediari Mercati Finanziari - ASSOSIM is the Italian Association of Financial Markets Intermediaries, which represents the majority of financial intermediaries acting in the Italian Markets. ASSOSIM has nearly 80 members represented by banks, investment firms, branches of foreign brokerage houses, active in the Investment Services Industry, mostly in primary and secondary markets of equities, bonds and derivatives, for some 82% of the total trading volume.

The main goals of the Association are the following:
- representation of the interests of both Italian and foreign entities operating in the investment services sector, vis-Ã -vis public bodies and agencies, association of industrialists, public or private organisations and institutions in order to cooperate in the solution of problems relative to the sector and protect the interests of such entities;
- the preparation and diffusion of research and assistance in the sector related to the provision of investment services and with all other aspects of a regulatory and operational nature connected thereto, in the most appropriate manner such as by the organisation of conferences and other types of events, the promotion of courses and training seminars, the editing of research and other publications.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation
